title: Ascension
body: Dear Riot, please bring Ascension back. I really loved this game mode and I prefer above all others even URF, I know it was for all the shurima stuff with Azir and all that but whatever, change it so it suits a new theme or something but dear god bring it back, it was so funnnn.

replies.body:
man i agree, we should repost until people come and upvote our discussion. Ascension, is truly fun without tower and minions...
they could create same kind of mod without tower and farming.
